database.name: TestAndDemo3 regression test viewer
database.overview:
Demonstration with two SIARD packages and one DDV package with viewer information. Search with infotip. Redirection to the next report with "forward parameters". Use of BLOB. Use of metadata/description.txt with html tags.
This text is from queries.xml. Here follows the content of the file metadata/description.txt:

revisions.revision: Sample XML for regression test and demonstration of functionality
Add some dummy reports to test scroll bar
Link to next query/subquery with parameter from other column added

screen.selectDescription: A basic report without search parameters
screen.title: Title: Employees
screen.subtitle: Subtitle is optional.

screen.selectDescription: Simple search; use of forwarded parameters
screen.title: Various examples for use of link to next screen with forwarded parameters
screen.subtitle:
A link is made to another report (screen), with
- column "ID" value is used as a link parameter in ID column
- in the "The name" column, another column (i.e. ID) value is used as a parameter
- in the "Composite key" column, two columns will be passed as parameters, please select each of Jan Novak line
- Use of ORDER.
screen.query: SELECT "HR employees"."Id" AS "ID", "HR employees"."Employee Name" AS "The name" , 'show' AS "Composite key" FROM "HR members"."HR employees" WHERE "Id" != '1000'

screen.title: Example 1
screen.subtitle: Use of dropdown selection from a separate query returning two columns (value-to-be-searched, combobox-text); use of table alias; compare SQL code with report #5

param.name: Department
param.select: SELECT "Id", "Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."Departments" ORDER BY "Dept Name"

screen.query: SELECT "HR employees"."Id", "HR employees"."Employee Name", "HR employees"."date Hired /hq", "Assignments"."Id Employee", "Assignments"."Id Department", "Departments"."Id" AS "IDdep", "Departments"."Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."HR employees" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Assignments" ON "HR employees"."Id" = "Assignments"."Id Employee" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Departments" ON "Assignments"."Id Department" = "Departments"."Id"

screen.selectDescription: Specific use of SELECT, mandatory parameter
screen.title: Example 2
screen.subtitle: Mandatory parameter; use of SQL alias in the query

param.name: Department
param.select: SELECT "Id", "Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."Departments" ORDER BY "Dept Name"

screen.query: SELECT "eM"."Id", "eM"."Employee Name", "eM"."date Hired /hq", "aS"."Id Employee", "aS"."Id Department", "dE"."Id" AS "IDdep", "dE"."Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."HR employees" AS "eM" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Assignments" AS "aS" ON "eM"."Id" = "aS"."Id Employee" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Departments" AS "dE" ON "aS"."Id Department" = "dE"."Id"

screen.selectDescription: Use of BLOBS (note: using content of the 2nd SIARD package)
screen.title: Integration of RTF, JPG, PDF
screen.subtitle: A link is available for showing or downloading the BLOB contents.
screen.query:
SELECT "dbo"."table10"."id", "dbo"."table10"."poradi",
CASE WHEN "obsah" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "RTF",
CASE WHEN "picture" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "JPG",
CASE WHEN "documentpdf" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "PDF",
"dbo"."table10"."name" FROM "dbo"."table10"

blob.query: SELECT 'application/rtf' AS "ContentType", 'obsah.rtf' AS "filename", "obsah" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
SELECT 'image/jpeg' AS "ContentType", 'picture.jpg' AS "filename", "picture" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
SELECT 'application/pdf' AS "ContentType", 'document.pdf' AS "filename", "documentpdf" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
